thread.title: DIA flights getting cheaper, by a little
thread.title_full: DIA flights getting cheaper, by a little

author: Ben Miller
title: DIA flights getting cheaper, by a little
text:
DIA flights getting cheaper, by a little Jul 24, 2015, 7:21am MDT Industries & Tags Kathleen Lavine / Denver Business Journal Denver International Airport has the 13th-cheapest flights in the country, according to aâ€¦ more Airfares out of Denver International Airport aren't the cheapest in the country, not by a longshot. But they're not the most expensive in the country, either. According to a new report by travel website Cheapflights.com, Denver ranked No. 13 for airport affordability, with an average airfare of $292. That's down from No. 20 last year, when fares averaged $332, according to Cheapflights.com. According to the list, the cheapest 2015 fares were out of Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport, at $199. The most expensive flights were out of Honolulu International Airport , at $794. It was reported that weekly domestic departures are down 12.56 percent at DIA over the last four years, from 5,894 in 2011 to 5,154 this year. Ben Miller contributes to the Denver Business Journal and compiles the Morning Edition email newsletter.
